I am taking a artificial intelligence class for this quarter. It's so much fun and challenging. I wanted to take some notes on what I am learning.

I will go through several things in this post:

  • What is a search algorithm in A.I context?
  • What kind of problem does search algorithms solve?
  • What are most widely used search algorithms and how to implement them.

Algorithm concepts and implementations

  2. BFS
